MemoryInfobox.description: 'Learning that priests intended to get rid of Sokrates, Kassandra went on a quest to make sure they did no such thing.'
MemoryInfobox.location: Sanctuary of Athena Pronaia, Phokis, Greece

General_Description: '''Deposition Opposition''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra decided it was time to stop the priests' plan to rid themselves of [[Sokrates]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra stole evidence against Sokrates before making her way to the [[Sanctuary of Athena Pronaia|Sanctuary]] of [[Minerva|Athena Pronaia]], killing several [[Cult of Kosmos|Cultist]] [[Soldier|guards]] on the way.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Those priests must be the ones who hired the thugs and want to get rid of Sokrates.''
As she moved nearer the priests, she overheard their conversation.
*'''Priest 1:''' ''Once we have the papyrus, we simply add a few... special notes of our own. That, along with the fake evidence and our own testimony, and Sokrates can't win.''
*'''Priest 2:''' ''If they don't choose to kill him right then and there, it will at least discredit him for good.''
Kassandra killed the three priests.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Now that all the priests are dead, they won't be able to testify against Sokrates.'' ''I should return to Sokrates before the trial starts.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed three priests and stole their evidence to prevent Sokrates from being framed.
